name: Spirit (itch) (CrispLD)
description:
You are stranded in a world of basic geometry and being hunted by squares hungry for Spirits. You must defend yourself and sacrifice parts of your own life to buy upgrades to survive as long as possible!

Gameplay
  • There is a new wave of enemies that spawn every 50 to 100 seconds
  • Survive 500 seconds to win (harder than you think)
  • Collect Spirits to upgrade yourself
Software Used
  • Unity
  • Adobe Illustrator
  • Paint.NET
  • Bosca Ceoil
Controls
  • WASD for movement
  • RIGHT CLICK for shooting
  • MOUSE for aiming
